description: Welcome to your dashboard. Here you can manage your projects, circuits, and users.

actions.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to logout?

stats.totalCircuitsDescription: Total number of circuits in your project
stats.winRateDescription: Average completion rate across all circuits
stats.totalUsersDescription: Total number of users in your project
stats.activeUsersDescription: Users active in the last 7 days
stats.completedCircuitsDescription: Users who completed at least one circuit

circuitCard.betweenSteps: Between step "{step}" and the next one

emptyState.description: Get started by creating your first user journey to analyze user behavior and optimize conversions.
emptyState.title: Ready to create your first circuit?
emptyState.subtitle: Circuits help you track user progress through defined steps and identify friction points in your user experience.

eventsConsumption.title: Events Consumption
eventsConsumption.quotaWarning: You're approaching your events quota limit. Consider upgrading your plan.
eventsConsumption.quotaExceeded: You've exceeded your events quota. Please upgrade your plan to continue.

members.title: Members & Roles
members.description: Manage who has access to your organization and what they can do.

invites.title: Received Invitations
invites.noInvitationsDescription: You don't have any pending invitations at the moment.

settings.title: Project Settings
settings.description: Manage your project's general settings, API keys, and more.

general.title: General
general.name: Project Name
general.updateError: Failed to update project. Please try again.

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Manage your API keys for this project.
apiKeys.name: Name
apiKeys.empty: No API keys found. Create your first API key to get started.

createDialog.title: Create New API Key
createDialog.description: Create a new API key for your project. Give it a descriptive name to help you identify it later.
createDialog.name: API Key Name

confirmDelete.title: Delete API Key
confirmDelete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.description: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone.
dangerZone.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete the project and all its data.

usageSummary.title: Usage
usageSummary.upgradeToContinue: Upgrade to paid mode to continue using Ludiks
usageSummary.freeMessage: You have used {used} / {limit} events this month (free limit)
usageSummary.proMessage: You have used {used} events this month (no limit)
usageSummary.freeHint: Upgrade to unlimited by enabling billing.
usageSummary.proHint: Your billing automatically adapts to your usage.

quotaBanner.info: You have used {used} / {limit} events this month. Upgrade to unlimited to keep enjoying Ludiks without interruption.
